verbose_text: Whereas a similar TG1 integrase vector (supplementary material Table S4) induced valid GFP signal above background for all tested TcT att-site pairings in HeLa (P0 x B0, P3 x B0, P0 x B3 and P3 x B3), we were only able to confirm the expected CT {8,8} TcT P3 x B3 activity in HeLa via PCR amplification and sequencing of the attL and attR junctions (supplementary material Fig. S4).
evidence: integrase vector (supplementary material Table S4) induced valid GFP
